titleStmt.title: A discussion of the ansvvere of M. VVilliam Barlovv, D. of Diuinity, to the booke intituled: The iudgment of a Catholike Englishman liuing in banishment for his religion &c. Concerning the apology of the new Oath of allegiance. VVritten by the R. Father, F. Robert Persons of the Society of Iesus. VVhervnto since the said Fathers death, is annexed a generall preface, laying open the insufficiency, rayling, lying, and other misdemeanour of M. Barlow in his writing.
titleStmt.author: Parsons, Robert, 1546-1610.
Coffin, Edward, 1571-1626.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed at the English College press] Permissu superiorum,

notesStmt.note: The "generall preface" is written by Edward Coffin.
A reply to Barlow's "An answer to a Catholike English-man".
Both the Huntington and Folger copies have a slip-cancel on q2v.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the English College press] Permissu superiorum
